snippet: Former President George H.W. Bush was released from a Maine hospital four days after he fell at his summer home and broke a bone in his neck.
abstract: Former Pres George Bush returns to his summer home after being treated at Maine Medical Center for fractured vertebra, which he sustained in fall.
lead_paragraph: Former President George H.W. Bush was released from a Maine hospital four days after he fell at his summer home and broke a bone in his neck.

headline.main: Elder Bush Back Home After Doctors Fix Fracture
headline.print_headline: Elder Bush Back Home After Doctors Fix Fracture
